data.title: 键入缺少的字母，完成下面的文字
data.blankContent: My brother got in trouble because he posted answers to a test on the Internet. He won't say ____ he ____ the ____ before ____ test, but ____ shared ____ on a site ____ saves ____ materials. His ____ is ____ mad. But I think my parents are even angrier than his teacher is.
data.partBlankContent: My brother got in trouble because he posted answers to a test on the Internet. He won't say h__ he g__ the ans____ before t__ test, but h_ shared th__ on a site th__ saves te__ materials. His tea____ is ve__ mad. But I think my parents are even angrier than his teacher is.
data.fullContent: My brother got in trouble because he posted answers to a test on the Internet. He won't say how he got the answers before the test, but he shared them on a site that saves test materials. His teacher is very mad. But I think my parents are even angrier than his teacher is.
data.answer: 我弟弟因为在网上发布考试答案而惹上了麻烦。他不愿透露自己是如何在考试前得到这些答案的，但他将这些答案分享到了一个保存考试资料的网站上。他的老师很生气。但我认为我的父母甚至比他的老师更生气。
